Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,385 @@ +'use client' + +import { useEffect } from 'react' +import { motion } from 'framer-motion' +import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer' +import { Parallax, ParallaxLayer } from 'react-parallax' +import Image from 'next/image' +import Link from 'next/link' +import { FaCar, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaPhone, FaEnvelope } from 'lucide-react' + +const HeroSection = () => { + return ( +

About Us

+

+ AKW Racing Academy is a premier racing training facility located in Wellington, FL, in partnership with Piquet Race Park. +

+

+ Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors provide top-tier training for racers of all levels. +

+
+
+ +
+ +
+
+ ) +} + +const ProgramsSection = () => { + const { ref, inView } = useInView({ + triggerOnce: true, + threshold: 0.1, + }) + + return ( +
+
+ + Our Programs + +
+ + +

Beginner

+

+ Perfect for those new to racing. Learn the basics and build a strong foundation. +

+ + + +

Intermediate

+

+ For those with some experience. Improve your skills and techniques. +

+ + + +

Race Ready

+

+ Prepare for professional racing. Get the skills needed to compete at the highest level. +

+ +
+
+
+ ) +} + +const FacilitiesSection = () => { + const { ref, inView } = useInView({ + triggerOnce: true, + threshold: 0.1, + }) + + return ( +
+

+
+ +
+ +

Sodi Karts

+

+ Our Sodi Karts are perfect for beginners and intermediate racers. +

+

Rotax Engines

+

+ Experience the power of Rotax engines in our advanced racing programs. +

+ +
+
+
+ ) +} + +const InstructorsSection = () => { + const { ref, inView } = useInView({ + triggerOnce: true, + threshold: 0.1, + }) + + return ( +

John Doe

+

Champion of multiple races
